            parameters~. ~It is a subtype of <<a_api subproject="client" | type Eliom_service.service_kind >>~.
* <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"| ~'d>> is a phantom type~, subtype of <<a_api subproject="client" | type Eliom_service.suff >> stating the kind
            of parameters it uses~: suffix or not~.
* <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"| ~'e>> is the type of ~G~E~T parameters names~. ~See <<a_api subproject="client" | type Eliom_parameter.param_name >> and
            form generation functions ~(e~. g~. <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~Eliom~_registration~.~Html~5~.get~_form>>~)~.
* <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"| ~'f>> is the type of ~P~O~S~T parameters names~. ~See <<a_api subproject="client" | type Eliom_parameter.param_name >> and
            form generation functions ~(e~. g~. <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~Eliom~_registration~.~Html~5~.post~_form>>~)~.
* <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"| ~'g>> is a phantom type~,  subtype of <<a_api subproject="client" | type Eliom_service.registrable >>~,
            telling if it is possible to register a handler
            on this service~.
* <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"| ~'h>> is an information on what the service returns~.
            ~See <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~Eliom~_registration~.kind>>~.
